ExtensibilityScenarios.Name: SideBySideExtension
ExtensibilityScenarios.ShortDescription: Extension Scenario to create the sales order for one-time customer using SAP Cloud Platorm with complete architecture flow and detailed use case.
ExtensibilityScenarios.Long Description: SideBySideExtension describes the best way to build a small web shop application and guidelines to deployed it to SAP Cloud Platform.Functionality includes read/write data operations to your S/4 HANA cloud system. Scenario use case covers Customer orders a product, a sales order gets generated. This example covers end to end detailed implementation, leveraging the SAP Cloud Platfrom.

FocalPoints.Name: Creation of a custom business object in SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Connection setup of the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system and SAP Cloud Platform
Creation of a complex sample Java application (with a simple UI)

FurtherUsecases.Name: Creation of a custom business object in SAP S/4HANA Cloud
Connection setup of the SAP S/4HANA Cloud system and SAP Cloud Platform
Creation of a complex sample Java application (with a simple UI)

ExtensibilityScenarios.Name: Sales Order Analytics
ExtensibilityScenarios.ShortDescription: Extension Scenario to create the sales order statical insights for one-time customer.
ExtensibilityScenarios.Long Description: Sales order analytics provides Statical visualization of data and be customatized based on geo location.

ExtensibilityScenarios.Name: Map Extension
ExtensibilityScenarios.ShortDescription: Extension Scenario to create the Analystics order for one-time customer
ExtensibilityScenarios.Long Description: build a small web shop-like app deployed to SAP Cloud Platform and read data from/write back data to your S/4 HANA cloud system. When ordering a product, a sales order gets created.
